summary: The provided diff excerpt does not include the Field deletion implementation, so there is insufficient evidence that the requested backend deletion-rule removals and task-cascade behavior were implemented. Additionally, an unrelated documentation/state summary file was modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update backend Field deletion logic so a user can delete their own Field without any multi-creator restriction (do not require “at least two actors/users exist” to allow Field deletion).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for backend/main.mo is truncated before any Field deletion function/logic is shown, and no visible changes reference removing a multi-creator restriction.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated in diff; deletion logic not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the backend rule that prevents Field deletion when the caller would have fewer than two Fields remaining (remove the “maintaining user fields requires at least two” restriction).
missing_requirements.reason: No Field deletion logic or checks about remaining Field count are visible in the truncated backend/main.mo diff excerpt.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated in diff; deletion logic not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Allow deleting a Field regardless of whether it contains tasks by cascading deletion of all tasks in the Field and cleaning task dependencies that reference deleted tasks.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not show any code that deletes tasks by fieldId during Field deletion, nor any code that removes dependency IDs referencing deleted tasks.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated in diff; deletion/cascade logic not shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded project documentation/state summary in project_state.json (feature inventory text).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints emphasize implementing changes in backend/main.mo and do not request updating project_state.json or adding/updating documentation/feature inventory.
